verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: slow] - [V: cooked] [ARG1: turkey] sloppy joes this tangy sandwich filling is so easy to prepare in the slow cooker and it goes over well at gatherings large and small i frequently take it to potlucks and i 'm always asked for my secret ingredient —marylou larue freeland michigan onemain financial services rda enthusiast brands larue cook theresa freeland
